body:
Hi Siritip,

Every element in the file should be separated by one tab only, do not
use spaces. At the end of your last line (eg the "b" glazing) you should
have a carriage return.

I just tested this and it should work fine.

-Jack

siritip@umich.edu wrote:

--
# Jack de Valpine
# president
#
# visarc incorporated
# http://www.visarc.com
#
# channeling technology for superior design and construction
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Glaze.csh header and input format
subject: [Radiance-general] Glaze.csh header and input format
